name: Test Drive II Scenery Disk: California Challenge
overview: This add on features a border to border race through the Golden State, divided into 7 stages, which are: The California/Oregon Border to the Trees of Mystery, Trees of Mystery to Eureka, Eureka to Rockport, Rockport to San Francisco, San Francisco to Carmel, Carmel to Santa Barbara and Santa Barbara to Mexico. This Add on requires a copy of Test Drive II.
